bs-contextmenu-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of contextmenu extension
prefs-contextmenu: Used in [[Special:Wiki_Admin&mode=Preferences]], headline for context menu section in preferences.
bs-contextmenu-pref-modus-just-right-mou: Option in [[Special:Wiki_Admin&mode=Preferences]], radio button label for displaying the menu with a right click
bs-contextmenu-pref-modus-ctrl-and-right: Option in [[Special:Wiki_Admin&mode=Preferences]], radio button label for displaying the menu with a right click and CTRL key pressed
bs-contextmenu-page-edit:
Label for menu item that opens edit mode of a page
{{Identical|Edit page}}
bs-contextmenu-page-delete:
Label for menu item that opens delete dialog of a page
{{Identical|Delete page}}
bs-contextmenu-page-move:
Label for menu item that opens move dialog of a page
{{Identical|Move page}}
bs-contextmenu-page-history: Label for menu item that opens history view of a page
bs-contextmenu-page-protect: Label for link context menu item that opens protect dialog the page linked
bs-contextmenu-page-purge: Label for menu item that purges page cache and opens view mode of a page
bs-contextmenu-page-info: Label for menu item that that opens detailed information dialog of a page
bs-contextmenu-media-reupload: Label for menu item that that opens re-upload dialog of a file
bs-contextmenu-media-view-page: Label for menu item that that opens the description page of a file
bs-contextmenu-user-mail: Label for menu item that that opens e-mail dialog for a user
bs-contextmenu-user-talk: Label for menu item that that opens talk page of user in edit mode
bs-contextmenu-file-download:
Label for menu item that that opens download link of a file
{{Identical|Download}}
apihelp-bs-contextmenu-tasks-summary:
Describes the API endpoint that context menu items
{{doc-apihelp-summary|bs-contextmenu-tasks}}
bs-contextmenu-open-in-new-tab: Label for menu item that opens the page in a new tab
bs-contextmenu-no-items: Message that is displayed when no context menu items are available
